testCaseBlueprint.description: 5G EVE Multi-site Gaming use case TCB_ES
testCaseBlueprint.name: 5G EVE Multi-site Gaming use case TCB_ES
testCaseBlueprint.configurationScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress  $$userB:$$passwordB sudo systemctl start probe_ffmpeg & sudo docker start probe;
testCaseBlueprint.resetConfigScript: EXECUTE COMMAND vnf.a048c404-7277-4def-b9a8-7fb10bfbc5a2.extcp.mgmt0.ipaddress $$userA:$$passwordA sudo pkill -f node; EXECUTE COMMAND vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo systemctl restart probe_ffmpeg & sudo docker restart probe;
testCaseBlueprint.executionScript: EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.a048c404-7277-4def-b9a8-7fb10bfbc5a2.extcp.mgmt0.ipaddress $$userA:$$passwordA cd vcompression & FFMPEG_OUTPUTS=vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp1.ipaddress:1234 UUID=$(sh dmidecode.sh | grep UUID | awk '{print $2}') /usr/bin/node index.js; EXECUTE_COMMAND vnf.5b8b2cbb-ea91-41e8-9b3a-daa00ae1a082.extcp.vprobe-cp0.ipaddress $$userB:$$passwordB sudo docker exec -w /var/www/html/proyectos/videoqualityprobe/Release -e "SERVER=10.3.5.100" -e "TOPIC1="$$metric.topic.QualityMetric_es""" -e "TOPIC2="$$metric.topic.ProbeBitRate_es"" -e "TOPIC3="$$metric.topic.SI_es"" -e "TOPIC4="$$metric.topic.TI_es"" -e "TOPIC5="$$metric.topic.Blur_es"" -e "TOPIC6="$$metric.topic.FrameRate_es"" -d probe node index.js;
